Text: christmasam getting a jacket made for your dad to give your mom at Christmas I need to get an idea of her waist size He gave me a few measurements off a jacket in her closet but I dont have any idea about waist or hips If either of you have a good guess let me know ASAP Thanks Chris Do You Yahoo Yahoo Shopping Thousands of Stores Millions of Products

Date Mon Nov ReturnReceiptTo Patti Micklin MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType textplain charsetiso Subject Yallbonics The Association of Southern Schools has decided to pursue some of the seemingly endless taxpayer dollar pipeline through Washington designating Southern slang or Yallbonics as a language to be taught in all Southern schools The following are excerpts from the YallbonicsEnglish dictionary HEIDI noun Greeting HIRE YEW Complete sentence Remainder of greeting Usage Heidi Hire yew BARD verb Past tense of the infinitive to borrow Usage My brother bard my pickup truck JAWJUH noun The state north of Florida Capitol is Lanner Usage My brother from Jawjuh bard my pickup truck BAMMER noun The state west of Jawjuh Capitol is Berminhayum Usage A tornader jes went through Bammer an left in improvements MUNTS noun A calendar division Usage My brother from Jawjuh bard my pickup truck and Ah aint herd from him in munts THANK verb Cognitive process Usage Ah thank ahll have a bare BARE noun An alcoholic beverage made of barley hops and yeast Usage Ah thank ahll have a bare IGNERT adjective Not smart See Arkansas native Usage Them bammer boys sure are ignert RANCH noun A tool used for tightnin bolts Usage Ah thank ah left my ranch in the back of that pickup truck my brother from Jawjuh bard a few munts ago ALL noun A petroleumbased lubricant Usage Ah sure hope my brother from Jawjuh puts all in my pickup truck FAR noun A conflagration Usage If my brother from Jawjuh dont change the all in my pickup truck that things gonna catch far TAR noun A rubber wheel Usage Gee Ah hope that brother of mine from Jawjuh dont git a flat tar in my pickup truck TIRE noun A tall monument Usage Lord willin and the creek dont rise Ah sure do hope to see that Eiffel Tire in Paris sometime RETARD verb To stop working Usage My grampaw retard at age FAT noun verb A battle or combat to engage in battle or combat Usage You younguns keep fatn n ahm gonna whup yuh RATS noun Entitled power or privilege Usage We Southerners are willin to fat for are rats CHEER adverb In this place Usage Just set that bare rat cheer FARN adjective Not domestic Usage Ah cuddint unnerstand a wurd he sed must be from some farn country DID adjective Not alive Usage Hes did Jim ARE noun A colorless odorless gas Oxygen Usage He caint breathegive im some ARE BOB WAR non A sharp twisted cable Usage Boy stay away from that bob war fence JEW HERE noun and verb contraction Usage Jew here that my brother from Jawjuh got a job with that bob war fence cumpny HAZE a contraction Usage Is Bubba smart Nahhaze ignert He aint thanked but a minnitn is laf SEED verb past tense of to see VIEW contraction verb and pronoun Usage Ah aint never seed New York City view GUBMINT noun A bureaucratic institution Usage Them gubmint boys shore is ignert

Re Apartment LeaseI have a fax at work Sorry you are having to fool with all of that Im sure youre right and Ill talk to you sometime tomorrow Chris wrote Hey Chris I was wondering if there was a fax number at the base so that my apartment complex can send you some info regarding getting your name taken off of our lease If there is just shoot me off an email with the number and Ill pass it along to them Hope things are going well and that youre not too homesick with Thanksgiving and all I have a feeling I will be talking to you guys tomorrow along with both of our parents and extended family members Have a great holiday and root on the Horns I think this is going to be a tough one Love Susan Do You Yahoo Yahoo Shopping Thousands of Stores Millions of Products

think your plan sounds fine Im not sure there is too much he can do to talk his way completely out of it I just dont like the fact that he has been such a weirdo lately It sounds like he just may have a flaw of some type I guess if he had a serious girlfriend come back into his life or something maybe that would explaing things Otherwise if he was goint through some type of other trauma you would think he would share it with you I cant wait to find out how it goes Molinas sounds great what a place to make a tense situation more relaxed The phone call is a must I wouldnt answer any more e mails from him ever About KoreaIm glad you are still coming over It will be fine that you are coming with your parents Well just drag them along with whatever we want to do I dont recall them ever slowing us down before Have fun in London Do you have any Enron interviews scheduled Im sure you and Emily are going to have a lot of fun I hope you like the London office I guess you may have heard our latest We filed all of the paperwork electronically for our followon assignment after Korea We ranked Germany Hawaii Savannah Ft Bragg NC and Ft Campbell KY in that order The guys e mailed us back and said he wouldnt be able to get us Europe or Hawaii and that Savannah is overstrength and that he would probably need us at Campbell Needless to say we are both furious about getting our last choice Not necessarily with the base but with our lack of selection Ft Campbell wouldnt have even been in our list if it wasnt the only place left where Chinooks go It really ticks me off that hard work just doesnt pay off in the Army We didnt get an option coming out of Korea we got an assignment Whats the incentive to do your job well and most importantly what is the incentive to stay in Im so mad that we dont have any say in our next assignment and that Chuck could likely get Korea again after that Gotta love the Army Its not a done deal Ive got to get Chuck fired up a little to fight this whole thing The guy said hed get back to us in a few weeks and let us know for sure I hope we can beat him with a response and at least try and negotiate with him We may even extend months in Korea if it will make a difference Ft Campbell is an hour outside of Nashville TN I think there are nice areas to live in closer to Nashville Maybe we could live halfway in between and I could work in Nashville and Chuck could commute a little to work I just hate the idea of living in another small town for another years Enterprise was enough Well keep you posted Maybe it will work out for the best anyway Maybe this is how Chuck is going to get his big fixed wing break Let me know how the whole Ted thing goes and well start planning for your visit Chris Do You Yahoo Send instant messages get email alerts with Yahoo Messenger

happy birthdaySusan Sorry we didnt call last night I thought about your birthday the night before and reminded Chuck that we HAD to call you on Thursday Chuck started Air Assault School yesterday and thats turned everything upside down Well call you tonight Sorry we missed you last night Chris Do You Yahoo Great stuff seeking new owners in Yahoo Auctions

just got wordHey we just got word that all permanent change of station moves have been suspended That probably means that we will not be able to leave Korea tomorrow as scheduled No word on when that may change but we will keep you posted Chris and Chuck Do You Yahoo Get email alerts NEW webcam video instant messaging with Yahoo Messenger

celebrating the Armys birthdayCelebrating the Armys Birthday Chuck and the other soldiers in Korea report that their morale is much improved by the change in headgear Do You Yahoo Yahoo Buzz Index Spot the hottest trends in music movies and more beretjpg

heySusan Hey just thought Id check in I have done some looking and it seems like is the best price I can find for a round trip Houston to Korea The only catch is that the rate is a military rate I have NEVER been asked to show a military ID at the airport I have asked around and no one that I know if has ever been asked either I really do think youd be safe Id just buy the ticket here in your name and send it on to you If you dont do it that way the fares are running around and up The price of is what Chuck and I did home for Christmas and would be on Asiana Airlines Let me know if you are still interested in coming and what you think about the fares Hope you had a good time in Seattle Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

FwdThought these were some nice pictures that one of the guys who was stationed here last year took I want to know where he is stationed right now though I think Chuck would love to be doing flying like that Chris Note forwarded message attached Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger XApparentlyTo via web Jul PDT Received from flawhotmailcom EHLO hotmailcom by mtamailyahoocom with SMTP Jul PDT Received from mail pickup service by hotmailcom with Microsoft SMTPSVC Sat Jul Received from by lwfdlawhotmailmsncom with HTTP Sun Jul GMT XOriginatingIP From derek lehr To Subject Fwd Date Sat Jul MimeVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartfe MessageID XOriginalArrivalTime Jul UTC FILETIMEBEC ContentLength From jack vilardi To Date Sat Jul Hello I just thought you might like to see some pictures of our most recent trip to the Bahamas Talk to you soon Jack Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp jpg jpg jpg

Re visitSusan If you leave on Tuesday the th you will arrive on the th here That part is fine However if you leave on the following Sunday youll be back into Houston Sunday Here is the tenative itenerary Looks like Continental leaving Tues Aug going from Intercontinental to LAX Korean Air from LA to Korea at You would arrive on Wed evening the th at pm Leaving Sunday would put you on a flight leaving Korea at pm on the th and arriving to LA at in the afternoon and leaving again on Continental at and arriving in Houston at pm Sunday night Let me know how that sounds Chris wrote Sorry I didnt call this weekend but I was swamped Saturday and subsequently exhausted on Sunday I basically rotated from my bed to the couch to the pool to the couch and back to bed Pitiful but much needed Anyway I was just going to tell you to go ahead and buy the ticket for me Departing the th and returning the thwhich I believe puts me into Seoul Wednesday night and departing on a Sunday You can either call or email if you have any questions for me And Ill decide where Id like to go for the long weekend I may pick two and just let you two decide the final destination Sue This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any r eview use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

RE visitI can check on getting an earlier flight but I have a feeling thats it I have a new computer at work and dont have messenger downloaded yet but if you think you might be at work for a while I might try and do it Chris wrote It all sounds pretty good but is there any way to get on an earlier flight Sunday Probably not I know there are only a few flights out a day but if I could get into Houston closer to late afternoon on Sunday it would be a better for me Id really like to stay that Saturday nightso if worse comes to worse Ill just deal with the jet lag Susan Original Message From ticketsSusan Havent bought your tickets yet but have a feeling I wont be able to do anything about you getting in at pm Sunday I will ask though You should be leaving on Tuesday and returning to Houston on Sunday and leaving Korea on Sunday The total air fare should be Shoot me a quick e mail if this is not ok Otherwise I will plan on purchasing your tickets this afternoon Thanks Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

RE ticketsI changed the time You will get in around pm on Sunday now and only leave Korea minutes earlier Ill email you the entire itenerary tomorrow morning my time for your final approval I will buy the tickets after you have a chance to give the times one more look Chris wrote sounds goodid rather be useless a day at work than miss a day over therein the grand scheme of life Original Message From Scott Charles ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESScottCharlesCcscottFkoreayahooEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday July PM To Susan Scott Subject tickets Susan Havent bought your tickets yet but have a feeling I wont be able to do anything about you getting in at pm Sunday I will ask though You should be leaving on Tuesday and returning to Houston on Sunday and leaving Korea on Sunday The total air fare should be Shoot me a quick e mail if this is not ok Otherwise I will plan on purchasing your tickets this afternoon Thanks Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger File refermailtagline This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contr act by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

ticketsSusan Continental leaving Tuesday Aug at to San Fran at Korean Air leaving San Fran at and arriving in Korea at pm on Wednesday Aug Thats outbound for you I think they made the reservation wrong on the return Ill have to go back today and check it out Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

got your ticketSusan We bought your ticket yesterday I will either put it in the mail to you today or if I do end up making it to the states I will mail it from there Where do you want to go when you get here Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

heySusan I mailed your tickets today They said that the fastest I could get them there is days We should be able to make it just keep checking your mail Your itenerary is as follows Tuesday August IAH to SFO am am on Continental SFO to Korea pm pm on Korean Air you will arrive on Wednesday August Sunday August Korea to LAX pm am on Korean Air LAX to IAH pm pm on Continental you will arrive back in Houston on Sunday th Anyway I think thats it I hope the itenerary is ok As far as packing I would bring clothes for hot humid weather about like Houston Nothing we do is very dressy I would say a nice shorts outfit or skirt is about as dressy as it gets here Wear comfortable and shoes you really dont care about The monsoon season may be ending soon but the streets are disgusting year around Bring your running shoes and I will try to keep you training for the marathon There is an ATM on post here that we can use free of charge so dont worry about cash too much You can always write us a check We can also cash a check for up to day Definitely do not change any money There are some places around here that give pretty good rates I would pack light and bring an extra suitcase You may want to buy some pottery here or some fragile items so make sure you have extra room on your carry onn bsp Of course theres always mailing things too There is a DMZ tour on the th st rd and th Probably one of the Saturdays would be better for Chuck If we do go somewhere we should plan on going the first weekend you are here That DMZ tour on the Saturday before you leave would be a long day but you dont fly out until the next day so I think we could do it if you are game Cant wait to take you around here and you can see what weve been doing the past year here Have a good weekend Chris Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger
